price: On je Onaj Koji je poslao Svog Poslanika s Uputom i Vjerom Istine da bi je uzdigao iznad svih vjera, makar to višebošci mrzili.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī arsala rasūlahu bil-hudā wadīni al-ḥaqi liyuẓ'hirahu ʿalā al-dīni kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikūna
